subject: Awards, Decorations and Honors
Testosterone
Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Ryan Braun, the National League M.V.P., made his first public appearance since reports surfaced of his positive test for elevated testosterone, which he is contesting.
snippet: Ryan Braun, the National League M.V.P., made his first public appearance since reports surfaced of his positive test for elevated testosterone, which he is contesting.
